title.value: Выращивание и болезни телят (кормление, диагностика, лечение и профилактика болезней)
Husbandry and diseases of calves (feeding, diagnosis, treatment and prevention of diseases)

organization.name: Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine

person.name: Mironenko, V.M., Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

organization.name: Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

abstract.value: The monograph represents a complex research of the different diseases of calves. Contagious and infectious diseases, non-communicable, bacterial, viral and parasitic diseases of animals are reflected. The influence of feeding of pregnant non-milking cows on vitality of newborn calves, their growth and development, is analyzed. Organization of high-effective feeding system of calves due to preservation of high quality fodder is substantiated. Non-contagious diseases of calves (proventriculus atony, rumen tympany, peptic ulcer disease of abomasum etc.) are researched and described. Intoxication of animal s with different poisonous substances, such as herbicides, pesticides and other chemical substances is evaluated. Infectious and viral diseases of young animals are analyzed; the most important reasons, promoting development of infectious and viral diseases, are outlined. Bacterial diseases, micoplasmoses and fungal disease along with invasive disorders of animals are researched. The most important directions of disease prevention and main concepts of growth of healthy calves are offered.
